eggsplode.title: Eggsplode
eggsplode.description: If you draw this card and don't have a Defuse, you lose the game.

defuse.title: Defuse
defuse.description: Put an Eggsplode card back into the deck. Used automatically when you draw an Eggsplode card.

nope.title: Nope
nope.description: Stop the action of another card. Can be used by clicking on the **Nope** button.

attegg.title: Attegg
attegg.description: End your turn without drawing and force the next player to take 2 turns in a row.

predict.title: See the future
predict.description: Look at the first 3 cards on the deck.

food1.title: Boiled egg
food1.description: Use 2 of this card to steal a card from another player!

food2.title: Fried egg
food2.description: Use 2 of this card to steal a card from another player!

food3.title: Ham & Eggs
food3.description: Use 2 of this card to steal a card from another player!

food4.title: Pancake
food4.description: Use 2 of this card to steal a card from another player!

food5.title: Fried chicken
food5.description: Use 2 of this card to steal a card from another player!

radioeggtive.title: Radioeggtive
radioeggtive.description: Put this card back into the deck face up.

radioeggtive_face_up.title: Radioeggtive (Face up)!
radioeggtive_face_up.description: You lose the game. No escape.

draw_from_bottom.title: Draw from the bottom
draw_from_bottom.description: End your turn by drawing from the bottom instead of the top.

targeted_attegg.title: Targeted Attegg
targeted_attegg.description: End your turn without drawing and force a player of your choice to take 2 turns in a row.

alter_future.title: Alter the future
alter_future.description: Look at the next 3 cards on the deck and rearrange them in any order.

reverse.title: Reverse
reverse.description: End your turn without drawing and reverse the order of play.
